login.title: Veloq
login.subtitle: Connect to Intervals.icu
login.instructions:
1. Open Intervals.icu Settings
2. Scroll to "Developer Settings"
3. Copy your API Key
login.invalidApiKey: Invalid API Key. Please check your key and try again.
login.connectionFailed: Failed to connect. Please check your API key and try again.
login.securityNote: Your credentials are stored securely on your device

settings.title: Settings
settings.primarySportHint: Affects home screen metrics and default stats page view.
settings.defaultMapHint: 'Default' uses the map style set above
settings.syncAllHistoryDescription: This will sync up to 10 years of activity data in the background. This enables deeper route analysis and comparison.
settings.syncInProgress: Please wait for the current sync to complete.
settings.clearAllReloadDescription: This will clear all cached activity data, GPS traces, and route matching data, then start reloading. This may take a few minutes.
settings.clearRouteDescription: This will clear all route matching data and immediately re-analyse GPS traces.
settings.cacheHint: Caches activity locations and GPS traces for World Map and route matching. By default, syncs 3 months. Use "Sync All History" for deeper analysis.
settings.routeMatchingDescription: Automatically detect repeated routes from your activities
settings.disconnectDescription: This will remove your API credentials from the app. You will need to enter them again to use the app.
settings.dataSourcesDescription: Activity and wellness data is synced from intervals.icu, which integrates with various fitness platforms and devices.

alerts.clearCacheMessage: This will clear all cached activity data, GPS traces, and route matching data, then start reloading. This may take a few minutes.
alerts.clearRouteCacheMessage: This will clear all route matching data and immediately re-analyse GPS traces.
alerts.syncAllMessage: This will sync up to 10 years of activity data in the background. This enables deeper route analysis and comparison.
alerts.disconnectMessage: This will remove your API credentials from the app. You will need to enter them again to use the app.
alerts.failedToClear: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
alerts.failedToDisconnect: Failed to disconnect. Please try again.

explanations.trainingLoad: Training Stress Score (TSS) quantifies training load based on duration and intensity relative to your threshold.
explanations.heartRate: Average heart rate during the activity.
explanations.energy: Estimated energy expenditure from heart rate, power, and duration.
explanations.conditions: Temperature from weather data or your device sensor.
explanations.yourForm: Your Form (TSB) on this day. This is a daily value based on your overall training, not specific to this activity. TSB = Fitness (CTL) minus Fatigue (ATL).

fitnessScreen.title: Fitness & Form
fitnessScreen.fitnessDescription: is a 42-day exponentially weighted moving average of your training load.
fitnessScreen.fatigueDescription: is a 7-day exponentially weighted moving average of your training load.
fitnessScreen.formDescription: is fitness minus fatigue. Train in the

routesScreen.title: Routes
routesScreen.enableInSettings: Enable route matching in Settings to automatically detect repeated routes from your activities.

statsScreen.title: Performance
statsScreen.garminNote: Charts may include data from Garmin devices

heatmapScreen.title: Heatmap
heatmapScreen.processFirstHint: Process some activities in the Routes screen first to generate a heatmap.

routes.expandTimeline: Expand the timeline to analyse more activities. Route matching will continue in the background until complete.
routes.routesWillAppear: Routes will appear after your activities are analysed
routes.routesWithTwoPlus: Routes with 2+ activities on similar paths will appear here
routes.sectionsDescription: Sections are detected when you travel the same roads multiple times, even on different routes
routes.adjustSportTypeFilter: Try adjusting the sport type filter
routes.frequentSectionsInfo: Frequent sections are road segments you travel often, detected automatically from your GPS tracks.

errorState.defaultMessage: Failed to load data. Please try again.

noActivities.title: No activities yet
noActivities.description: Your activities will appear here once you sync with Intervals.icu

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your search or filters

networkError.title: Connection error
networkError.description: Check your internet connection and try again

noData.title: No data available
noData.description: Complete some activities to see your stats

attribution.garminTrademark: Garmin and the Garmin logo are trademarks of Garmin Ltd.
